> dyn.load("../lib/libOscCalc.dylib")
> energies <- seq(from=0.1, to=10, by=0.1)
> probabilities <- rep(0,100)
> .C("twoFlavorMuSurviveArray_R",baseline=as.double(735),nenergies=as.integer(100),energies=energies,probabilities=probabilities)
